transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Bhaaji
Customer: haan Dev Vatsal bol rahe ho?
Executive: haan bataiye
Customer: Dev Vatsal main ye puchna chah raha hu ye se machine se baat kar raha hu main?
Executive: haan haan main jaan gaya
Customer: main puch raha tha yaar ki call check karte hai wo kaha check karte hai dikhai nahi de raha kahin
Executive: kya cheez?
Customer: call aati hai na wo check karte hai kis kis ki call aayi hai
Executive: kiski call aayi hai incoming call na?
Customer: ji haan haan wo yaar dikh nahi raha mujhe kahin
Executive: lead manager mein lead manager mein dikhega
Customer: lead manager mein gaya haan theek hai
Executive: aap suno na desktop se hai?
Customer: laptop se hu main
Executive: to usme upar dekhiye filters bane honge hai na?
Customer: haan filter ka sign bana hai
Executive: filter pe click kariye
Customer: kar diya
Executive: to isme dekhiye source mein likha hua hai all direct buyleads calls catalog views hai na?
Customer: haan haan
Executive: all pe click karke apply kariye aapko incoming jitni calls aayi hui hai IndiaMART se wo alag se aa jayegi aapko
Customer: calls pe karu all pe kar du?
Executive: calls calls calls c c se calls
Customer: calls theek hai abhi dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: yaha to koi hai
Executive: haan ji
Customer: mila sir?
Executive: haan theek hai mil gaya mil gaya
Executive: theek hai?
Customer: haan theek hai bhaiji
Executive: okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to check incoming calls.

Resolution:

- Executive guided to check calls in lead manager.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, lead manager, filters
